ygData.subject: Re: At our base
ygData.msgSnippet: The three Stunticons look into the hatch and see Motormaster s mangled body. What happend to him? asks Speedbreaker in a stuttering manner. Who cares

From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

The three Stunticons look into the hatch and see Motormaster's mangled
body. "What happend to him?" asks Speedbreaker in a stuttering manner. "Who
cares" replies Dead-End, not really asking but stating a fact. "Well, you
guys better pull him out and repair him" commands Astroblast. "And why
should we?" states Drag Strip betraying his bad mood. "Because with out him
you cant form Menasor. Besides we are already outnumbered on this planet,
we need him" yells Astroblast. Speedbreaker climbs in and grunts as he
picks up the shutdown Stunticon. "What'd you guys run into" he stammers.
"Just some Maximals. A lot of them" replies Astroblast. Speedbreaker
carries Motormaster to the edge of the shuttle and Drag Strip grabs part of
him helping. "Suppose we were to accidently drop him off a cliff" Drag
STrip says quietly. Meanwhile free of his cargo Astroblast starts to
Transform.
